name: Bibleseeds
tagline: Online Social Bible Commentary & Study Tools
body:
### Welcome to BibleSeeds.

This is the initial implementation for online social bible commentary & study tools. The idea is to be able to share your comments / thoughts / ideas / notes / sermons - and can be cross referenced with Bible verses.

Todo:
* Store Bible with multiple translations
* CRUD for the Articles (comments, thoughts, ideas, notes, sermons, etc)
* Auto Cross-Ref Notes & Bible
* 

### Authors and Contributors
* @mudiarto
* kalvin budiman
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
